name: Eidolic
description:
You play James, a young man grieving the loss of his sister Emily, when a Medium contacts you informing you that you sister is trying to reach out to you.. you begin at the place of your sisters rest, and journey to save your sisters soul from the torment of Hell.  along the ride you will encounter horrifying entity's and possibly, just possibly befriend your own insanity, in this atmospheric horror exploration game. This game was made in 2 months but if it finds support ill keep working on it.

if the game gets support I will

1.  address known bugs

2. optimize

3. add free and frequent content updates

4. complete "The Crypt"

5. Add "Hell" level

if the game garners A lot of support,

I will add DLC levels and an additional story. Enjoy the game!
